alert.note: Alert for Albany; Carbon (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:48PM MDT until July 17 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Carbon County in south central Wyoming... Central Albany County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 446 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Battle Mountain to near Elk Mountain, moving east at 35 mph. At 434 PM, Walcott Junction mesonet recorded a wind gust of 57 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain and Arlington. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 248 and 285. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
